Html: When I click "equip custom gemming" on an item it won't show jewelcrafting prismatic gems like Runed Dragon's Eye.  I am a JC and I have 2 prismatic gems equipped already, but it won't let me select anymore.  In addition if I replace a prismatic gem with a non-prismatic and then try to put the prismatic back in, it won't show up.  What's going on?
Do you have Jewelcrafting enabled in the filter?
i got the same prob and cant find a way to fix that :/
